title: Notifications
permissionText: Allow sending notifications to not miss blackouts.
notificationsBlocked: Notifications are blocked in browser settings.
webPushDescription: Notifications arrive even when site is closed
silentModeDesc: No system notifications, only in panel
serverUnavailableDesc: Updates will be available once server is restored.
subscriptionActivatedDesc: You will receive notifications about blackouts
subscriptionDeactivatedDesc: You will no longer receive push notifications
